import{QUERY_COMPETITION_INFO,QUERY_ALL_FORMATS,QUERY_ALL_SPORTS,QUERY_SPORT_INFO,QUERY_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING,QUERY_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING,EDIT_COMPETITION,EDIT_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING,EDIT_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING,UPDATE_SCHEDULE}from"redux-saga/actions";import{QUERY_ALL_FORMATS_SUCCESS,QUERY_ALL_FORMATS_FAILED,QUERY_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED,QUERY_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,QUERY_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED,QUERY_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,QUERY_COMPETITION_INFO_SUCCESS,QUERY_COMPETITION_INFO_FAILED,QUERY_ALL_SPORTS_SUCCESS,QUERY_ALL_SPORTS_FAILED,QUERY_SPORT_INFO_SUCCESS,QUERY_SPORT_INFO_FAILED,EDIT_COMPETITION_SUCCESS,EDIT_COMPETITION_FAILED,EDIT_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,EDIT_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED,EDIT_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,EDIT_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED,UPDATE_SCHEDULE_SUCCESS,UPDATE_SCHEDULE_FAILED}from"./reducers";export var queryCompetition=function queryCompetition(data){return{type:QUERY_COMPETITION_INFO,response:{success:QUERY_COMPETITION_INFO_SUCCESS,failed:QUERY_COMPETITION_INFO_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var editCompetition=function editCompetition(data){return{type:EDIT_COMPETITION,response:{success:EDIT_COMPETITION_SUCCESS,failed:EDIT_COMPETITION_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var editFinalStageSetting=function editFinalStageSetting(data){return{type:EDIT_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING,response:{success:EDIT_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,failed:EDIT_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var editGroupStageSetting=function editGroupStageSetting(data){return{type:EDIT_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING,response:{success:EDIT_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,failed:EDIT_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var updateSchedule=function updateSchedule(data){return{type:UPDATE_SCHEDULE,response:{success:UPDATE_SCHEDULE_SUCCESS,failed:UPDATE_SCHEDULE_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var queryFinalStageSetting=function queryFinalStageSetting(data){return{type:QUERY_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING,response:{success:QUERY_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS,failed:QUERY_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var querySportInfo=function querySportInfo(data){return{type:QUERY_SPORT_INFO,response:{success:QUERY_SPORT_INFO_SUCCESS,failed:QUERY_SPORT_INFO_FAILED},data:{path:data.path,param:data.param,data:data.data}};};export var queryAllSports=function queryAllSports(){return{type:QUERY_ALL_SPORTS,response:{success:QUERY_ALL_SPORTS_SUCCESS,failed:QUERY_ALL_SPORTS_FAILED}};};export var queryAllFormats=function
